fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will deal a Powerful attack to one random player who is *targeting* your target. You can attack players who do not visit your target, or leave their homes at all.
- Your ability cannot be stopped by jail or imprisonment, or any ability which stops other abilities, except by you being directly roleblocked.
- All those eligible for death who are not attacked will learn your name.
- You can attack other Stalker players, but you will always attack them last.
- Your ability is considered an attack against the player you embody, though you will not actually attack them.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You attacked someone who visited your target!"
"They saw the Specter."
